sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>Set the default value of 'ignore_cache' in 'sys_properties' to 'true'.</description> <name>Set Ignore Cache for account path pro</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_properties'); if (gr.get('897fdf73c3311200e94a9f2974d3aeda')){ gr.setValue('ignore_cache', true); gr.update(); } ]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-08-30 23:05:08</sys_created_on> <sys_id>9fd0a29323700300afff2d0d96bf657b</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Set Ignore Cache for account path pro</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="">f4854379db01111086a072c7f496191a</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_9fd0a29323700300afff2d0d96bf657b</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-08-30 23:20:15</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Set Ignore Cache for account path pro
